channel.title: I need help making this work
channel.description:
I need to make Bandos armor, Armadyl Armor work, also Third age.
Also, I need to know how to make the Dragonfire Shield, Dragonfull helm work.
And last - I need to know how to make it so you can max your skill to 100, not 99, *This is for all players who play the server*

item.title: I need help making this work
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok well we got the Tassets to work, we need the pl8 to work though.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 12:58:48 PM[/size][hr]Bandos plate - Goes in Weapon slot
DragonFullHelm - Glitches a bit
Armadyl Plate - Goes in weapon slot
Armadyl Legs - makes you invisible.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 01:02:19 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making this work
